android-cloexec-epoll-create1.description:
Description

epoll_create1()
should include
EPOLL_CLOEXEC
in its type argument to
avoid the file descriptor leakage. Without this flag, an opened sensitive file
would remain open across a fork+exec to a lower-privileged SELinux domain.

Examples:

epoll_create1
(
0
);
// becomes
epoll_create1
(
EPOLL_CLOEXEC
);
android-cloexec-epoll-create1.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
